title: 对MinecraftEdu的建议（已经发送）
author: 矿工小周
txt_content:
本帖最后由 矿工小周 于 2015-2-22 22:00 编辑 

您好，我是中国上海市XX（原文非此）中学的教师。Hello,I'm a teacher from XX High School  Shanghai China.
我的英文不怎么好，希望您能听的懂。Please forgive my poor English,I just hope you understand it.
我们对于MinecraftEdu十分感兴趣，认为它可以使得学生更好的吸收知识。。We think MinecraftEdu is an AWESOME project which can help us to make students interested in much boring knowledge.
但是由于中国特殊的教育方式，我们希望取得进一步的支持。BUT.
China have its own education method,and it's really different with others.
So we want to communicate more deeply.
还有一个问题，中国在这方面有过先例吗？One another question,have any other Chinese try MinecraftEdu Before?
只是在这里晒出来= =另一个帖子是http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-413793-1-1.html
